amendment.description: To modify a Federal share for a specific project under 49 U.S.C. 5307.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1942 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1942 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Hollings. (consideration: CR S13118; text: CR S13118) To modify a Federal share for a specific project under 49 U.S.C. 5307.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1942 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Hollings.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1942 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
